title: review: error running 'git review pending' on clean repo
body:
On a fresh clone:

```bash
$ git review pending
git diff --name-only  
fatal: ambiguous argument '': unknown revision or path not in the working tree.
Use '--' to separate paths from revisions, like this:
'git <command> [<revision>...] -- [<file>...]'

git-review: exit status 128
```

@rsc

P.S. The main tree is closed. Is the review tree open? I'd be happy to send a change for this and some other review items, if so. If not, I'll file a few more issues.
